id.description: Unique ID for the job definition. Will be assigned if not provided.

name.description: The name assigned to the harvest configuration.

type.description: The type of harvest configuration, ie. OAI-PMH or bulk XML.

id.description: Reference to the ID of the storage engine to use.

name.description: Used for look-up by name as an alternative to reference by id (id will be used if present).

id.description: Reference to the ID of the transformation pipeline to apply.

name.description: Used for look-up by name as an alternative to reference by ID (id will be used if present).

enabled.description: Indicates if the job is scheduled for running

harvestImmediately.description: Whether to harvest when the config is persisted.

metadataPrefix.description: OAI-PMH only. The metadata prefix supported by the OAI-PMH service to harvest from.

oaiSetName.description: OAI-PMH only. The name of a record set offered by the OAI-PMH service to harvest from.

resumptionToken.description: OAI-PMH only. PMH identifier for fetching the next batch of records.

url.description: The URL to access the data from.

currentStatus.description: Indicates the state of the job. Assigned by API.

lastHarvestFinished.description: The date and time when the most recent harvest job with this configuration completed.

lastHarvestStarted.description: The date and time when the most recent harvest job with this configuration began.

lastUpdated.description: The date and time when this definition was last modified.

nextHarvestSchedule.description: The date and time when a job with this definition should be run (if job is enabled).

amountHarvested.description: Number of records harvested in last run. It seems this should really be an integer, but string is what the WSAPI gives us.

message.description: Message summarising results of last run.

cacheEnabled.description: Whether or not to store incoming records in Harvester's file system.

diskRun.description: Whether or not to run harvest job from records cached in a previous job run.
